TopicTitle: Kerbol Escape velocity on Minmus SOI change

Articles.Content:
I just returned a pod from Minmus orbit, at the SOI it flipped to kerbin and then straight back to Minmus. 

Orbital velocity was  11816981 m/s 

Is this a known bug?
What mods do you have? Pics of the offending craft? Does this happen every time or is it a one time thing?
